review: One of the best Alien games ever made! If you don't own it, get it! If you havent finished it, finish it!This is my game of the year I don't think any other game is going to offer the same experience that I have just gone through. This makes Outlast look like a minigame.

If you like anything to do with space then this is the game for you!!!!It is one heck of a challenge to start off with but is very rewarding once you are a pro at building space stations :P , It kinda makes me wonder how they did this stuff in real life.
